name: smoke-file-from-devcontainer-folder
initializeCommand: touch /IdeaProjects/spring-app-example/file-test.txt && echo 'This is a test file.' >> /IdeaProjects/spring-app-example/file-test.txt
mkdir -p /IdeaProjects/spring-app-example && echo 'This is a test file.' > /IdeaProjects/spring-app-example/file-test.txt
mkdir -p /workspace/IdeaProjects/spring-app-example && echo 'This is a test file.' > /workspace/IdeaProjects/spring-app-example/file-test.txt
